ygData.subject: Re: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: There are various areas of a zone that you will hear music in. The bank in North Freeport. The East-North Karana bridge. The main aviak nest in South Karana.
ygData.messageBody:
There are various areas of a zone that you will hear music in. The bank in
North Freeport. The East-North Karana bridge. The main aviak nest in South
Karana. You enter the area and the music starts playing. You leave, it
stops.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)

8)-----Original Message-----

8)>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
8)>
8)>I am not sure if it looks different - maybe you just need to
8)look at it
8)with
8)>and outside view? Did you change vid card drives?
8)>
8)>The first time I (my first char) saw a bard - she was
8)playing her lute next
8)>to the Qeynos Hills cottages (I think she knew that there is a music
8)trigger
8)>there and was having some fun with newbies (like me)). We
8)chatted and I
8)>found out she was a bard (duh the lute was my first clue!)
8)And when she
8)>started to move off, I said watch out there is a griz over
8)there. To which
8)>she responded: "Oh good! I shall slay it!" And then zoomed
8)off across the
8)>hills doing the Selos run-zoom thing. That was so cool
8)looking - I just
8)new
8)>that I would be a bard someday.
8)>
8)>Sylly.
8)>

8)> I suppose that is a good enough topic for this question.
8)>Last night, I
8)> saw a bard playing a song that I thought I had never seen
8)>before. I
8)> found out that it was Selo's, but it looked different than
8)>when I play
8)> Selo's. It had the white pulsing flashes, but it also had
8)>small purple
8)> lights or something. When does Selo's start to look
8)>different? Anyone
8)> know?
